author: Kate Riley
excerpt: Oh how lovely you are September! I’ve been taking long walks in the soft sun each day and continuing my ceramics practice. I’m learning more advanced techni ...
text: Oh how lovely you are September! I’ve been taking long walks in the soft sun each day and continuing my ceramics practice. I’m learning more advanced techniques, it feels good to understand the nature and stages of clay and to create with my hands what I see in my mind. This week I’m focused on little projects around the house like paint touch ups here and there, some cabinet reorganization, and settling in to the months of cozy ahead since I have no travel plans until December. I’ve got all my soft blankets out and candles on every surface for chilly fall evenings. Bliss! Favorite links from the week: This cozy home blends dark wood and taupe painted cabinets so well. The countertops in this kitchen look really beautiful paired with white cabinets. If you like fluted wood paneling, you’ll love this laundry room space. This is quite a glamorous hotel in New Orleans. 13 things that make a home look dated (agreed, with the exception of white appliances). How to make your home more appealing for sale. This elegant coastal wedding on Martha’s vineyard. Color symbolism (what emotions/things our culture associates with each color). This is the first I’ve heard of a “do nothing” cake but it looks simple and tasty! How wi-fi was created 25 years ago. The number one key to happiness is…
html:
Oh how lovely you are September! I’ve been taking long walks in the soft sun each day and continuing my ceramics practice. I’m learning more advanced techniques, it feels good to understand the nature and stages of clay and to create with my hands what I see in my mind.

This week I’m focused on little projects around the house like paint touch ups here and there, some cabinet reorganization, and settling in to the months of cozy ahead since I have no travel plans until December. I’ve got all my soft blankets out and candles on every surface for chilly fall evenings. Bliss!

Favorite links from the week:

This cozy home blends dark wood and taupe painted cabinets so well.

The countertops in this kitchen look really beautiful paired with white cabinets.

If you like fluted wood paneling, you’ll love this laundry room space.

This is quite a glamorous hotel in New Orleans.

13 things that make a home look dated (agreed, with the exception of white appliances).

How to make your home more appealing for sale.

This elegant coastal wedding on Martha’s vineyard.

Color symbolism (what emotions/things our culture associates with each color).

This is the first I’ve heard of a “do nothing” cake but it looks simple and tasty!

How wi-fi was created 25 years ago.

The number one key to happiness is…
